name: Babylon Premium Hotel & Spa
address: 05-07 Hàng Hòm, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở trung tâm Hà Nội, Babylon Premium Hotel & Spa tọa lạc cách Nhà thờ Thánh Joseph 6 phút đi bộ và Nhà hát múa rối Thăng Long 600 m. Khách sạn 4 sao này có máy ATM và dịch vụ tiền sảnh. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Tất cả các phòng tại khách sạn được trang bị điều hòa, khu vực ghế ngồi, TV màn hình phẳng có truyền hình vệ tinh, két an toàn, phòng tắm riêng, vòi sen, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và máy sấy tóc. Các phòng đều có ấm đun nước, trong đó một số phòng có sân hiên và một số khác thì nhìn ra thành phố. Tại Babylon Premium Hotel & Spa, các phòng đều đi kèm với ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn buffet hoặc thực đơn à la carte. Tại Babylon Premium Hotel & Spa, khách sẽ tìm thấy nhà hàng phục vụ ẩm thực Mỹ và Âu. Bên cạnh đó, họ có thể yêu cầu món chay.

Đi xe đạp là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực. Ngoài ra, khách sạn có dịch vụ thuê ô tô.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần Babylon Premium Hotel & Spa bao gồm Hồ Hoàn Kiếm, Ô Quan Chưởng và Tràng Tiền Plaza. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Nội Bài, cách chỗ nghỉ 24 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The room was very clean and comfortable with a large and well furnitured bathroom (I give 10/10). The decoration was fabulous and as new and accurate as shown in the photos (I love it). The staffs was amazingly friendly and helpful. The staffs at the reception desk gave us all the tips when we checked in; always friendly with smiles every time when we had questions; they helped us to book taxi on a rainy day when we could not catch a taxi due to the bad weather; after checking out at noon, we left our luggages at the hotel and when we came back to pick them up in the evening, the staff gave us clean towels and let us have quick showers before we left; the staff in the kitchen was caring and asked us if we would like anything else like a crepe for our breakfast; 10/10 for the bellboy always being helpful and kind with smiles. The breakfast was very fresh with speciaties of Hanoi (I had "Banh cuon" every morning). 10/10 for the location. We have a good chicken Pho just next to the hotel. There's no window in our room but the staff called and informed us about this prior to our arrival (no room with windows left) and it did not bother us. Briefly, 10/10 for giving us an absolutely comfortable stay in Hanoi.

review.comment_positive: The location of the property is amazing - it sits basically half way between the lake and train street making it a great location for walking to all sights. The rooms are on the small side but definitely are great if you just want a room to sleep and value the location like us. Highly recommend!

review.rating: Kind, generous and loyal staff. Inspiring.
review.comment_positive:
Babylon Premium Hotel, lead by a committed workforce, is a wonderful establishment in the bustling old quarter of Hanoi. I had the pleasure of staying here during my birthday and the events that followed after I arrived would absolutely motivate me to stay here again. After a day of sightseeing, I returned to my room to be greeted with birthday decorations, a birthday cake and 3 key members of staff (including the manager) wishing me a happy birthday. 

Additionally, the next day, a family was celebrating their daughters birthday during breakfast and the hotel made a similar effort by giving her a birthday cake too. Such actions really do show that the hotel staff care about their guests and will happily go out of their way to make their holiday memorable. Thank you so much!

review.comment_positive:
Amazing location in Old Quarter.
Friendly staff. Took care of all our luggage and interactions with coach and taxi drivers.
Die Damen an der Rezeption waren sehr nett und überaus hilfsbereit 👍. Das Frühstück war vergleichsweise schwach!

Trotz der späten Ankunft (22 Uhr) wurden wir herzlich empfangen und haben uns direkt gut aufgehoben gefühlt. das Personal ist freundlich und spricht exzellent Englisch. 
Unser Zimmer war sauber, ruhig und bereits bei der Ankunft gut klimatisiert, sodass einer erholsamen Nacht trotz der Feiern in den umgebenden Straßen nichts im Wege stand. 
Sehr zu empfehlen ist auch der angebotene Shuttle Service bei der Abreise. Schnell und unkompliziert gelangt man so zu einem super fairen Preis an den Flughafen.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Our first night in Vietnam was at Babylon Hotel in Hanoi. The receptionist Mary was a delight to meet. She allowed us a very early checkin. As we were on our honeymoon, our room was beautifully decorated. The staff at this hotel, especially Miss Mary made our experience amazing. She even came all the way outside till our car to say us goodbye when we were checking out. Room was small and cozy, nothing exceptional but it was clean. The Ac worked like a charm. The hotel is situated in the heart of old quarters. Few minutes walk to train street. Would 10/10 recommend it.

review.comment_positive:
I stayed here initially 3 nights and returned for a fourth after a long bus ride from Ha Giang. The location perfect, rooms are comfortable, well air conditioned and clean. The lower level room without a window was perfect for a 5 am arrival and a day sleep and the suite was great for the balcony and street view. The lower level room was actually nicer than the suite in my opinion! 
While the hotel was good the staff were what really made it exceptional. I was feeling a bit rough after a long bus trek and 5 days in the mountains and they noticed I was feeling poorly. They made me ginger tea, helped me book a flight when I had issues with booking online and took care to make sure I was comfortable and well for my ongoing journey. For the price point I don’t think you can do better. Thank you for making my trip so special.
review.comment_negative: The door on the suite hard to close and the paint needs an update but overall it was acceptable

review.rating: This is an exceptional hotel which instantly feels like a home from home.
review.comment_positive: The hotel is very conveniently located in the centre of Old Hanoi.  The hotel has been renovated to a high standard retaining charm and character.  All the facilities worked impeccably. The staff were all extremely helpful, charming and welcoming, especially Mary and Kate at the reception, the bellboy, the lady incharged of breakfast and Tony at the tour desk.  Nothing was too much trouble. Breakfast was fresh, tasty and beautifully presented.  Menu items could be ordered at no extra charge.  The dining room was available all day after breakfast for guests to relax, rest or eat their own food. The hotel organised professional, high quality excursions.

review.comment_positive:
まず、チェックインの際のスタッフの出迎えが本当に素敵でした。ウェルカムドリンクと素敵な笑顔で周辺の観光スポットまで教えてくれ、荷物も男性の方が部屋まで持って行ってくれました。お部屋もとても清潔でエアコンも効いていて快適に過ごせました。
朝食が非常に美味しく、品数が多いビュッフェの他にスタッフがその場で作ってくださるメニューも豊富にありました。
チェックアウト後も荷物を預かってくださり、次ハノイに来た際も必ず訪れたい宿です。
ここ一年、35カ国周りたくさんの宿を泊まってきましたがここまで、お安い値段かつ素敵なサービスなホテルは初めてです。

review.comment_positive: Babylon Premium was an oasis in the hustle of Hanoi. The staff were wonderful from the moment we stepped in, giving us a welcome juice and explaining a map of the city as we sat in the reception. We were additionally greeted warmly each time we left and entered the hotel, including having the door opened for us more often than not. Breakfast combined buffet items with dishes made fresh to order and was lovely. Our room was clean and bright and as we were in the middle of the hotel there was minimal noise and we slept very well. Would 100% return - we actually left to do a Halong Bay trip then returned for one more night to an even warmer welcome back.

review.comment_positive:
Can't recommend Babylon enough. I loved my 3 night stay here. A 30 second walk to one of the main shopping streets in old quarter Hanoi, less than 5 minutes walk to the night markets and Hoan Kiem Lake, and 10-15 mins to train street, the prison and military museum. 

Delicious breakfast also included, buffet and a la carte options available. 

The staff were exceptional from start to finish. So welcoming and friendly and caring. Reception staff, the young men at the front door, restaurant staff and tour staff - you are always greeted when passing by. 
Room was made up on request also.
Fast and cheap laundry service available too.

Le petit déjeuner varié avec des plats vietnamiens et occidentaux.  Le personnel extrêmement dévoué et toujours disponible ; une mention particulière pour l'équipe à l'accueil notamment Mary qui s'est occupée de la réservation de Limousine Même après notre départ.  Nous gardons un merveilleux souvenir de cet hôtel et le service exceptionnel et la bienveillance du personnel.  Nous reviendrons!

She helped me out with a personal issue, was always checking  with me if everything was good, finding me the best places to eat and shop. You made my stay special Kate, thank you.

Siempre con una sonrisa, ayudándote en todo, dando consejos y viendo que estés bien. Mención para el chico que trabaja de botones. Es extremadamente amable y siempre está pendiente de ti. El hotel es bonito y está muy céntrico. El desayuno es mejor que en la mayoría de hoteles y el sabor es bueno.

Quizá es el mejor hotel en el que he estado en términos de la atención.

Andererseits ein Hotel mit einem sehr guten Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis. Nur an der Sauberkeit im Bad könnte man nachbessern. Dies ist allerdings kein Einzelfall in Vietnam.

review.rating: Overall, this is an excellent hotel.
review.comment_positive:
Overall, this is an excellent hotel. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful, the rooms are in good condition and efficiently cleaned by the housekeeping staff while you're out. The breakfast offering is very diverse, and the staff strives to ensure a wide selection is always available. Noteworthy is the option to place individual orders such as pancakes or eggs with the breakfast staff, traditional Vietnamese dishes like Pho are also available.

The hotel's location is extremely central, with attractions such as Hoan Kiem Lake or St. Joseph Cathedral easily accessible on foot. Additionally, there are plenty of restaurants and cafes in the immediate vicinity.

Sadly, we only stayed for one night but had a great stay at the Sapa Queen Mountain House. The staff were amazing. They were so friendly and nothing was too much for them. We had an early start on the morning we left, before breakfast was being served and they kindly made us a breakfast to take with us on the bus.
Our room was large and well-equipped with a very comfortable bed. We don't often write about towels - usually because they are not very good - but at the Sapa Queen Mountain House they were wonderful.
The hotel was located close to the lake and the main tourist areas.

review.rating: Lovely staff who went above and beyond!

review.comment_positive:
I've stayed in dozens of hotels in Southeast Asia, but Babylon Premium was the only hotel where every single staff member was friendly, courteous, and exceedingly helpful - from the reception staff to the doorman to the kitchen staff; everyone went out of their way to make sure everything was okay.

Bonus - they provided me with a 'tip sheet' with local tips to avoid scams; as well as a list of local restaurants within a stone's throw of the hotel.  I visited six of their recommendations, and all were superb and exceedingly affordable; and none were tourist traps!

review.comment_negative: There was no safe located in my room even though it was stated that there will be one. Room security can be enhanced further; there was no door viewer (peep hole) or latch lock from the inside of the room.

review.comment_positive: My stay in Hanoi was just brief (and I wish I stayed a little longer). Overall, the staff gave us a very warm welcome. In fact, they allowed us to check in a little earlier and the room was in excellent condition. I also enjoyed the buffet and the chef really did a good job in preparing us special meals out of the menu. The Pho was exceptional. Additionally, the hotel was strategically located within the central district. Hence, walking and taking a good stroll around the streets day and night was very convenient. I also appreciated how friendly the staff were when we had to check out around 3 am. I would definitely come back here and I would also highly recommend this place! Worth more than your money...

review.rating: I enjoyed the brief stay very much and would certainly stay there again.
review.comment_positive: The hotel was "quirky" but in a very nice sort of way, the staff wer extremely friendly and helpful and the location of he hotel was excellent!
review.comment_negative:
My room had only a very small window loooking on to a fire-escape stairway. I like natural light and would have preferred to have been in a room with standard sized windows to allow me to have something to look at apart frm the walls of my room.
Having said that, maybe if I had mentioned the "window" issue at the beginning of my stay, the staff may have moved me to a room with windows and natural light!!

review.comment_positive: Location was perfect.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast needed more options.

review.comment_positive: The hotel was exceptionally clean and comfortable. The staff was the best part of the hotel. The reception was exceptionally friendly and helpful. When our shower head stopped working, the staff ensured it was fixed within a few hours. The location was great.
review.comment_negative: The water inside the fridge was not complementary, but the water outside the fridge were.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The staff were very friendly and even gave us some ginger tea when my partner and I did not feel well. The location is excellent, near the lake and we felt having a room with an inside window was great as we could not hear the loud traffic outside. Lots of choice at breakfast and the hotel organized trips and an airport pick up which were really reasonable. Would really recommend the 5* Ha Long Bay cruise.

Nos alojamos en Marzo 2024, 2 noches y pagamos 106€. Camas de matrimonio y muy cómodas. Todo el personal muy amable y muy atento en todo momento. Desayuno muy recomendable. Muy céntrico. 
Nos tramitaron las entradas para ver el espectáculo de las "puppets" sin ninguna comisión y unas entradas en las primeras filas. 
(Información: Después de haber leído en foros que en los hoteles de más de 3 estrellas no te cobraban comisión, no es cierto, tanto en este como en otro que nos alojamos de 4 estrellas tuvimos que pagar la comisión).

review.comment_positive: The hotel has spacious rooms , clean and comfortable, a good selection at breakfast and as we had an early flight even gave us a pack up to enjoy on the taxi ride to the airport . The reception staff were very welcoming and happy to accommodate any requests .
review.comment_negative:
We booked two trips through the hotel and was disappointed . I feel this essentially was due to a lack of clear explanation via messages with Tony, the hotel manager . We were led to believe we would have limousine transport with maximum of 15 people but ended up on bus with around 40 . It may be a minor thing to some ,but we chose this for many reasons that I won’t disclose here . The trip described a cycle ride and an opportunity to mix with locals and on the day we were told that we wouldn’t be doing this . for us , experiencing the culture is key and therefore we were left disappointed. 
I messaged Tony and he did apologise and told us he would ensure we would have limousine transfer on our trip to ha long bay the next day . The day started well , the limousine transfer was luxury . The boat was described as 5 star and it certainly was very comfortable but didn’t merit a 5 star rating . The return limousine was shabby , old peeled banana skin left in the seat pocket , broken drinks holders and the driver didn’t exactly make me feel relaxed . When Tony asked us for feedback on our return the following day I attempted to tactfully tell him that actually there were still a few issues but only after giving positive feedback first .  He simply shrugged his shoulders and made me feel like I was being intentionally awkward which was not the case at all , I found this very unprofessional and I felt even the reception staff who witnessed this tried to over compensate with kindness and politeness towards us . We have travelled through Thailand , Cambodia and Vietnam and understand the diversity and don’t consider us people who are difficult to please . It was constructive feedback that was given in the hope that improvements could be made to the hotel and future customers benefit in the future . Clearly the manager thought he didn’t need to consider them .

review.comment_negative: nothing

review.rating: We like the location , the staff, and the room.
Unser perfekter Stützpunkt in Hanoi - unvergesslich
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel war unsere "Homebase" in Hanoi, wir waren gleich viermal da - und immer von einer gleichbleibend extremen Freundlichkeit empfangen, die wir auch im sehr freundlichen restlichen Land in dieser Form kaum mehr erlebt haben. Als mal eine extern geplante Tour schief ging, bemühte sich Mr. Tony so lange um passenden Ersatz, bis wir wieder zufrieden waren. 
Das Frühstück ist ausgezeichnet, Mischung aus Buffet und Bestellung - das Zimmer hängt natürlich von der gebuchten Kategorie ab, wir können die Premium Suite vorbehaltlos empfehlen und sind nach den Ausflügen immer wieder gern zurückgekehrt.
In der Umgebung gibt es alles, der See ist nur einen Katzensprung entfernt - man ist mitten drin im Trubel Hanois.
review.comment_negative: Derzeit wird im Nachbarhaus zu unterschiedlichen Zeiten gewerkelt, nachts herrscht aber Ruhe.

review.comment_positive: Great location! And staff is very friendly and helpful.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Returned for an extra night after a previous three night stay. We were welcomed like friends and even given a room upgrade as it was our second stay, so the bed was even bigger. This time we used the spa facilities and had a wonderful Vietnamese massage. We also used the laundry service and had our clothes returned clean and folded within 24 hours. As before, breakfast and the room couldn't be faulted. The location is excellent. Thanks again Babylon, would definitely return.

review.comment_positive: The customer service is top notch. Polite friendly people working there. My room was spacious and comfortable.

literally THE BEST HOTEL I have ever stayed in my entire life. the service is exceptional and they literally treat you like royalty. when we arrived, they welcomed us with juice and gave us tips and places on where to eat in Hanoi. we asked for a late checkout because our flight back to America wasn’t until 11pm but unfortunately the best they could do was 2pm because they were all booked up for the holiday. which was fine, since they said we can hang out in the lobby instead. they didn’t even charge us for the late check either because when we arrived we had to wait 20 minutes for our room to be ready. but 20 minutes wasn’t even that long of a wait!! they were just so kind!!! then we asked for a massage reservation VERY last minute and they were able to accommodate us. (note: the spa is at its sister hotel) not only that but they gave us 10% off for massage happy hour. they are honestly so great. please book this hotel. I really wished we had booked them for our earlier stay but at least we are ending our trip on an amazing note!

review.rating: Мы остались довольны нашим выбором гостиницы Babylon Premium Hotel&Spa
review.comment_positive: Мы останавливались в гостинице на 5 ночей с выездами по маршруту. В гостинице разрешают оставить большой чемодан на хранение.,что ценно для длительного путешествия. По прибытию гостям подают сок, багаж вносят в номер. Расположение гостиницы отличное, в Старом квартале (Old Quarter), на достаточно тихой улице, в 5-7 минут ходьбы до знаменитого озера Хоан Кием - озера Возвращение Меча. Все торговые улицы старого города, базар, рестораны все рядом с гостиницей. Ребята на стойке регистрации очень гостеприимные, доброжелателбны и готовы оказать любую помощь. Большое спасибо госпоже Бэк и молодому человеку (к сожалению не помню его имени). При заезде вам дают лист с рекомендациями, включая хорошие рестораны, кафе и еду. Их советы здорово помогают определиться при поиске мест, где пообедать, поужинать или выпить кофе. Завтрак проходит на 1 этаже, есть нормальный выбор буфет, а также вы можете по меню заказать дополнительные блюда такие как: суп, омлет, панкейк и т.д (бесплатно). Вы всегда найдете еду по вашему выбору, включая фрукты.  В один из приездов у нас был ранний выезд. Они приготовили нам с собой бутерброд и воду. В комнате каждый день 2 бутылки воды, чай, кофе. Кровать и подушки удобные. Очень чисто. Душ отличный, включая туалетные принадлежности. При выезде есть возможность принять душ на первом этаже, что очень ценно, если у вас поздний выезд и уже нет номера. Комнаты есть разные. Мы жили на 2,3,5 и 6 этаже. В первую нашу ночь мы получили  большую и красивую комнату на 5-м этаже с балконом. Это был подарок от гостиницы - повышение категории номера. Номер был супер. В следующие наши приезды мы жили в обычном номере. Комнаты небольшие, но удобные. Кровати удобные. Возьмите в расчет, что комнаты не имеют окно на улицу, только есть окно во внутренную часть гостиницы. Дневного света в комнатах нет. Я не знаю сколько номеров в гостинице есть с окнами на улицу. Если вы только спите в гостинице, это не очень существенно. Соотношение цены и качества хорошее. Рекомендую.
review.comment_negative: Заказывая гостиницу на booking я не очень поняла, что в номерах нет окна, которое выходит на дневной свет. Я поняла, что было написано окно на тихую улицу. Это не улица. Окно выходит во внутреннюю часть гостиницы   Если вы только приходите переночевать - это не существенно. Но если вы хотите быть в гостинице не только ночью, то выбирайте внимательно какой номер заказать. Я не знаю сколько номеров в гостинице с окнами или балконом. Может имеет смысл брать повышенную категорию номера. Я не очень люблю номера без дневного света. Но это индивидуально. Поскольку 2 раза из 3 мы приезжали только на ночь и уезжали утром, то это было не существенно.

review.comment_positive: Nel quartiere vecchio di Hanoi si nasconde questo hotel carinissimo, molto pulito, con stanze (quelle executive) decisamente convenienti nel rapporto qualità prezzo. Le superior sono forse un po' strette ma basta spendere pochissimo in più per avere camere molto comode. Sicuramente siamo al di sopra degli standard della città. Colazione con qualche opzione anche per chi predilige il dolce e perfino la possibilità di avere crepes cotte al momento. Buon assortimento di frutta. Da ultimo: il personale è gentilissimo e al desk parlano inglese.
review.comment_negative: Tutto perfetto ma, se vogliamo trovare il pelo nell'uovo, la particolare conformazione delle case di Hanoi permette di avere finestre prevalentemente sulla facciata e non sui lati. Dunque moltissime camere hanno affaccio esclusivamente interno.

review.rating: Babylon Premium Hotel & Spa ... premium delivered!
review.comment_positive:
My wife and I can not speak highly enough of the Babylon Premium Hotel and Spa for it exceeded our every expectation. The quality of front-of-house staff is truly unmatched in our long travel experience. 

While loathe to single an individual out from a winning team, it is a mark of respect to acknowledge that Bich is exceptional. Her caring manner, quiet leadership, attention to detail, and commitment to guest satisfaction is a key constituent of the Hotel's success. 

We loved the Hotel's location in the Old Quarter, our room was tastefully appointed and extremely comfortable, breakfast selection was both generous and delicious, and the staff was exceptional.

We thank you one & all and look forward to our next stay, for we will surely return another time.

review.rating: Top notch treatment by the staff at Babylon
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
The staff at Babylon Premium Hotel is truly exceptional.  While we have found great service at most of the places we've stayed in Vietnam, we were so impressed with the treatment we got from the staff at Babylon.  They go out of their way to make guests comfortable - what one would expect at an expensive 5-star hotel.
Our room had a huge bed (larger than King sized) and the room was clean, large, and comfortable.  Most importantly, it was very quiet at night so we had a great sleep.
The breakfast buffet has a large selection, and other items can be ordered off the menu.  A/C is quiet and works well.
review.comment_negative: There were no windows opening to the outside but this likely made it more quiet.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
I loved everything in this hotel. Location, room, staff. 
My room was super clean and very modern. 
The staff was very helpful whatever I needed. They helped me a lot to have a perfect stay in Hanoi.

The hotel location is also excellent.
2 min walk from the main area/ beer street but still pretty quite.

And probably they served the most satisfying breakfast during my stay. They had more western option compared to other hotels and everything was yummy.

And they offer shower option for late night flights which was very helpful since I was sweating all day outside before my midnight flight.
Definitely coming back!
Friendly staff

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Mi è piaciuta la posizione perché era vicinissima al centro di Hanoi e al tempio vicino al laghetto, raggiungibile a piedi. La colazione era buona ma poco assortita la parte di dolce e da italiana penso che lo abbiano notato tutti i clienti europei.
review.comment_negative: Dalle foto di booking sembra un vero hotel a 4 stelle ma non rispecchiano la realtà. Consiglio allo stuff di non esagerare con le aspettative attraverso delle foto fuorvianti per non deludere il cliente. Detto questo confermo che è stato un piacevolissimo soggiorno (vedi commento positivo).

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Das Personal und die Lage sind großartig! Sauberkeit und Frühstück sind top.
Die meisten Zimmer haben „Fenster“ in den Flur oder Lichthof, also nicht nach draußen. Das muss man mögen oder eins der Balkonzimmer buchen.

The staff were amazing. I cannot overstate their friendliness and kindness, and willingness to go above and beyond to make us feel comfortable. They made friends with our 2-year-old, and they always kept him entertained as we were passing through for the day's adventure. The facilities were great as well, the rooms were cleaned meticulously every day. As expected in a tropical humid environment, there's a small amount of mould in the corners of the bathroom - but I must stress you will find this at practically any hotel in this climate. Breakfast was great, with a range of western options as well as local ones. The coffee was good too!
Once again, the staff were some of the nicest people I've met and genuinely cared about our wellbeing and comfort.
review.comment_negative: No criticisms whatsoever.

review.room_type: Phòng Suite Gia Đình Có Tầm Nhìn

review.comment_positive:
The staff is extremely kind and helpful, they really go the extra mile and nothing is too much trouble for them (they even helped us order take away food on the phone). 

There was a lot of variety for breakfast and a nice mixture of Vietnamese and Occidental options. They had different types of fresh fruits, juices and different types of rice and noodles freshly cooked every day. They will even offer to pack you a breakfast if you are going on a day trip and are tight on time.
The room was very quiet considering how busy and noisy the streets are in the centre of Hanoi. Although the building seems rather old it is very well maintained. The bed was very comfortable. The hotel is within walking distance of all Hanoi's main attractions (if you don't mind walking in 35° and 80% humidity). There are shops, supermarkets and restaurants close to the hotell.
review.comment_negative:
It would be nice that they offered some drinks in the mini bar other than water.
The aircon was a bit temperamental sometimes and went off randomly in the middle of the night a few times.

review.rating: Perfect stay, would definitely come back
review.comment_positive:
I can highly recommend this place, as I’ve also been to other hotels in Hanoi in the same price range. My experience:
1) Extremely friendly staff who are willing to help with everything. From planning your activities in Hanoi to exploring Halong Bay or Sapa outside of the city.
2) Very good location, just one street behind the night market and a minute stroll to the Cathedral. I was a solo traveler, so I really valued the safe environment I was in
3) The rooms are clean and comfortable to stay in. Extremely clean, comfortable king sized beds and a Smart TV to top it up

review.rating: 喧騒の旧市街で静寂が在る素敵なホテル！
review.comment_positive: 旧市街にあって立地は便利。ほぼ行きたいところへ歩いて行ける上に、なんでも食べたいものに近くで出会えることが最高。その上喧騒的な周辺とは別世界、ほっとできる静寂が在るホテルで、スタッフの笑顔と優しさにも癒されます。朝食はビュッフェスタイルにプラスしてパンケーキ、フォー、卵料理なども頼め、どれもとても美味しかったです。最終日にハロン湾への一泊旅行をしましたが、その間にも気持ちよく荷物を預かってくれたことにも感謝！

we stayed in Babylon Premium hotel & spa for 3 nights separately. In between, we were on 2 tours to Sapa and Halong Bay. 
we like the cleanliness of the hotel, friendliness of every staff from reception to kitchen and their superb impressive service to every guest. we also like the breakfast spread and the extra mile extended to us in preparing a simple toast breakfast for us to take away on a very early morning trip to Sapa on the first morning.

review.comment_positive: The room is new, very clean and well-equipped. The front desk clerk will hand you a paper with information on local cuisine and sightseeing advices when you check in. All of the staff are polite and helpful. If we ever had any issues, they were always willing to help. The location is convenient for exploring the old town.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Comfortable stay with helpful and friendly staff.
review.comment_positive: Good location. Great staff who are friendly and helpful especially Mary and Andrea
review.comment_negative: Breakfast items were lukewarm, could have heated them up more.

review.rating: good location in old quarter, nice rooms
review.comment_positive: Location in old quarter, very central which is good, consider  usual Hanoi steet noise it in terms of what room you will book. we had a room with window ton inner side light atrium without view. This is a benefit as room was cool and very silent (clean anyway). Staff very friendly and care taking, breakfast with several choices. Driver service to Airport available.

review.rating: The most friendly staff I've ever met
review.comment_positive:
The most friendly and helpful hotel staff I've ever met. They were also very flexible and were always looking for a way to help.
As I arrived early in the morning my room wasn't ready yet but they offered me to have a shower and get changed before I started exploring the city which after an 11 hour flight was a game-changer.

I would specially like to thank Andrea who at some point was literally talking on two phones at the same time trying to fix a mistake my tour operator had made. I'm not sure I would have made it to Sapa if it wasn't for her.
The staff and room was lovely

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is in a great location and is within walking distance to Hoàn Kiếm Lake and many eateries. 
The room was small but this may be the case for a lot of hotels in Hanoi. The beds were very comfortable and the staff were very friendly and helpful. The hotel offers a small breakfast buffet which includes Bánh cuốn, fruit, cereal and toast. For the buffet you can also order eggs and pancakes (which they make fresh for you) and a few other drinks. The hotel also has a shower that you can use after checking out. They will also provide towels for the shower. 

There is a spa located downstairs and you will need to book through the hotel lobby. The spa staff are external to the hotel and only speak Vietnamese. The spa looks different to the pictures and is a little run down. Despite this the massage was still good.
review.comment_negative:
The room didn't have a window so no natural light. 
The sound proofing isn't the best and at times we could hear running water through the building or people outside in the hallway.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn

review.rating: Great staff, location, and breakfast. I'd visit again
review.comment_positive: The staff was incredibly warm and attentive, and made us feel very welcome. The breakfast was also delicious- a great buffet supplemented by a la carte dishes upon request.
review.comment_negative: There wasn't anything that stood out. If I'm being picky, it would be great to make the stairway available for guests in case the elevator is occupied during busy mornings. It was usable, but a little crowded since it was a storage space for the hotel.

review.rating: Établissement qui mérite entièrement ces bonnes notes.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Le personnel est au petit soin, ils sont à votre disposition et vous donne beaucoup de conseil. 
La chambre quant-à-elle, est spacieuse et possède de bons équipements (salle de bain, climatiseur, lit, etc). 
Par ailleurs, le petit déjeuner est très bien fourni avec assez de variété pour satisfaire tous le monde.
Enfin, l’emplacement de l’hôtel me semble correct mais n’étant resté qu’une seule nuit je ne pourrai pas non plus totalement le garantir. Néanmoins, l’établissement se trouve dans un quartier avec plusieurs restaurants, boutiques, bars, etc.
review.comment_negative: RAS.

review.comment_positive: céntrico, desayuno rico (nos íbamos antes de la hora y nos prepararon comida) fueron muy amables todos los trabajadores
review.comment_negative: La habitación un pelin justa pero correcta.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn

review.comment_positive:
Lo staff è davvero gentilissimo, abbiamo dovuto cambiare i giorni di permanenza in corso d’opera e ci hanno assecondato in tutto. 
La posizione è centrale, il quartiere non è fantastico ma strategico per tutte le partenze nei dintorni di Hanoi. 
Abbiamo prenotato con loro anche la Sena Cruise ad Ha Long ed è stato tutto perfetto.
review.comment_negative: La colazione è migliorabile

review.comment_positive: Skvelá lokalita, raňajky primerané.

The staff went above and beyond to accommodate any needs I had. They were able to quickly arrange for laundry to be done and had it back, ironed, and folded in only a few hours. They provided great material about nearby attractions, stores, and restaurants, and were able to quickly arrange tour requests. The spa services were great as well and a good value. The daily breakfast had tons of options including a small menu to order off of aside from the buffet. Room was comfortable and clean. Hotel location was excellent, right in the heart of the Old Quarter. I would stay here again.

review.rating: Nice hotel for a few nights only
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Nice people and warm welcome ! They gave us some advices on what to visit in Hanoi ! Clean and good breakfast, everything you need !
review.comment_negative: Small room with window in front of outdoor stairs..

review.rating: Fenomenal staff and a great stay overall.
review.comment_positive: The staff were fenomenal. Super helpful and very clear to understand. They were able to answer all our questions and provide us with suggestions and advice. The hotel is a little small but we were happy with everything we've seen.

review.rating: Lovely hotel in great location for old quarter

review.comment_positive:
We had a family room with a king bed and a double bed for our family of four. Despite the two big beds, the room was still really spacious.

Breakfast was decent for a hotel of this size. Staff were very friendly and welcoming. Location is right in the heart of the action of the Old Quarter.
review.comment_negative:
Obviously, being located right in the old quarter, there was some noise, especially as our room was on the 2nd floor.

Shower head was a bit leaky.

Can't really review this hotel as when we arrived we were told that the air conditioning had broken down because of the heat and we were being transferred to another property which was newer and had a balcony. We only had one night booked so agreed. Pretty disappointed in the new rooms (Hanoi Calista Hotel) as very small especially the bathroom. Had to ask for a hair dryer, the balcony door did not lock and then our main door wouldn't open and had to be fixed. All in  all a disappointing experience but the staff were all amazing and did their best.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Tolle Lage inmitten des Geschenens, trotzdem aber nachts ruhig; schöne, saubere Zimmer und leckeres Frühstück mit viel frischem Obst; sehr freundliches Personal; sehr unkomplizierte Organisation von Zusatzleistungen wie Airporttransport
review.comment_negative: nichts

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: We had 2 great nights at Babylon Premium! The staff was friendly, the breakfast was good and the room was comfortable. We had an early flight so they made us a to-go breakfast box, which was simple but nice. We would definitely stay again!
review.comment_negative: everything was great!

review.comment_positive: Hotel muy centrico, limpio y funcional, personal muy muy amable. Nos ayudaron en las dudas que no surgieron, no reservaron grab, nos esperaron a nuestra llegada con su servicio de Transfer...todo bien, lo recomiendo para pasar unos días en Hanoi.
review.comment_negative: Nada

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn

review.comment_positive:
El hotel estaba muy limpio, el personal siempre amable y cordial dispuestos a ayudarnos en cada momento, nos dieron recomendaciones de restaurantes.
El desayuno es en sitio pequeño pero estaba muy bien 
El día que nos fuimos nos íbamos muy temprano y ofrecieron empacarnos algo take away, me hizo acordar a mi familia. 
Está súper bien ubicado en el centro de Hanoi, cerca de todo. Caminamos a todos lados.
Se encargaron de pedir el taxi para el aeropuerto.
En general me sentí como en casa, sin duda volvería.

review.rating: 滞在時の満足感は高かったが。。

review.comment_positive: Amazing location for exploring the old quarter in Hanoi!  Perfect if you want a comfortable base to explore all the sights. Our first room was very noisy as it was next to the air-con fans, but the hotel was very accommodating about moving us and we had a lovely, quiet room.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast could have been a little more varied.

review.rating: Wir würden wieder hier her kommen!
review.comment_positive: Die Freundlichkeit und Hilfsbereitschaft des Personals. Die Lage war ideal. Die Familiensuite war sehr geräumig für 4 Personen. Viel Raum und Luft. Exekutive Zimmer sind ok wenn man da nicht zu lange verweilt, weil sie sind schon viel kleiner, aber ok für 2 Nächte. Das Frühstück ist in Buffetform plus Suppen wie Pho kann man bestellen. Es ist ein einfaches Buffet, aber es reicht aus für kurze Aufenthalte.
review.comment_negative: Man konnte das Treppenhaus nicht wirklich benutzen weil es überstellt war und so waren wir auf den einzigen Lift angewiesen. Nicht schlimm aber ab und zu mit Wartezeiten verbunden.

review.comment_positive:
Wonderful staffs and the room was really nice.

Thank you!

review.comment_positive: I like everything about this property. 100% good experience with this hotel.

review.comment_positive:
Stille og veldrevet hotel med fin stil og bra atmosfære! Meget sentralt, men når en var inne på hotellet så føltes det som den kaotiske Hanoi var borte. Rommet  var rent, ryddig, behagelig og stille. 
Veldig hyggelig personale som var oppmerksomme og hjelpsomme.
review.comment_negative:
Rommet var vendt inn i innvendig atriet og ikke hadde vinduer ut. Det ga litt klostrofobisk  følelse, på en annen side det var deilig å være utenfor byen. 
Likte ikke at jeg fikk flere mailer med påminnelse om bestilling av div. turer. Det opplevdes litt masete og unødvendig.

review.comment_positive: Staff friendliness and assistance. Always serrve with a smile.. Good breakfast every day.
review.comment_negative: Despite all the good things in the  hotel, At night the garbages were collected and centralised on the street right at the right of the hotel entry, so walking into the hotel you have to breath in the ugly smell of garbages. This is outside of the hotel's control, however  it made you feel uncomfortable walking into the hotel.

review.comment_positive: Very friendly and helpful staff

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn

review.comment_negative: 房間設備

review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel in a great location. The staff were very friendly and always willing to help with directions and advice on where to eat. The suite room was large, comfortable and had a lovely balcony overlooking the street. Despite this there was no noise at night. I would definitely recommend.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Amabilidad y Confort en el corazon de Hanoi
review.comment_positive:
Tiene una excelente ubicacion  a pocas cuadras del lago Hoa Kiem, y muy cerca de donde se hace el mercado nocturno durante el fin de semana.

El hotel se ve que es bastante nuevo. La habitacion tiene un tamaño comodo  (considerando que en Hanoi, en general todo tiende a ser pequeño), esta bien decorada, tiene todo lo necesario (pava electrica, minirefri, caja fuerte), cama y almohada confortable, baño con ducha separada.  Tambien  una ventana pequeña que da a un corredor interior (bastante bien para Hanoi que por lo general las habitaciones son sin ventanas o con ventanas  interiores)

El desayuno buffet fue excelente. Muy completo y rico

El personal muy amable.  Recibi una bebida de bienvenida y durante el check in me explicaron  todo en detalle, y me dieron un mapa de Hanoi y una hoja con los tips mas importantes para moverse por la ciudad y  recomendacion de restaurantes  cercanos.
review.comment_negative: No recuerdo nada que no  me haya gustado. Volveria a hospedarme a aqui.

review.rating: Very conveniently located, beautiful little boutique hotel.
review.comment_positive: Junior suite is very comfortable with a fantastic balcony. Even though it faces the street, the room was sound proof. I’m a light sleeper but had no trouble at all here. The ladies at the front desk were also extremely friendly and very helpful.

L’hotel ha una posizione strategica nell’Old Quarter, comodo con tutte le attrazioni principali raggiungibili a piedi. La struttura è di ottime finiture e di classe, La camera è molto pulita come il bagno e la doccia è davvero enorme. 
L’accoglienza e la gentilezza dello staff sono ineguagliabili, vi aiuteranno con qualsiasi vostra richiesta.
review.comment_negative: Siamo stati solo una notte

We stayed in the Junior suite both times. Very comfortable. 
Buffet breakfast and also can order pancakes etc. 
We will stay again when we return to Vietnam.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn

review.rating: We wish all hotels were as good as this one
review.comment_positive: The hotel arranged a transfer and the driver was waiting as soon as we exited the airport.  As soon as we arrived at the hotel we were invited to sit down and given tea while we were checking in.  The room was plenty big enough with a good shower and nice soft bed and pillows.  The hotel is a great base for wandering around the local, interesting shops and at the weekend the night market.  Next morning breakfast was a buffet with plenty of choice and excellent service.  If we go back to Hanoi we would definitely stay at this hotel again and have an extra night to explore more of the old town

review.comment_negative: despite cozy room, it didn’t have a proper window and I would have preferred this to be called out at the reservation page. internet is slow.

review.comment_negative: nothing

review.comment_positive:
깨끗하고 깔끔
직원이 굉장히 친절
조식 무난 (뷔페식, 메인요리는 4가지 정도로 주문하면 만들어서 갖다줌)
주위에 유명 맛집들이 가까이 많이 있음
방향따라 다르지만 골목 초입에 있어 밤에도 길이 밝음
골목을 좀 걸어들어오는 반대방향으로 들어와도 가게들이 많아 길이 밝음
가게들은 많지만 시끄럽지 않음
어떤방들은 창문열면 복도는 아니지만 건물 안이 보이는 구조인 듯.. 일반 더블이나 트윈 중에 있는 방들 같은데..
잘 선택해야 할 것 같음
도보로 모든 곳을 가깝게 10분 안쪽으로 댕길 수 있음
내가 묵은 방은 제일 큰 베란다가 있는데 선베드와 이쁜 의자가 있어서 사진 찍기도 좋음 (바빌론 스위트룸)
좋은 숙소 강추다
review.comment_negative:
아쉬웠던 건 내가 다녀본 호텔들에 비해 수건이 적음
물론 말하면 더 주겠지만ㅋㅋ

보통 이용했던 곳들 2명 기준은

일반크기 수건 2개씩 4장
큰 수건 2장
발수건용 1장
(더 챙겨주는 곳은 손닦기용 1장까지 플러스)

이건데 다른거 다 떠나 일반 수건이 2장뿐이여서 아쉬웠음

review.comment_positive: The staff were amazing. Especially Jun and Bich were very helpful and really looked after us.
review.comment_negative: Rooms were a bit small.

review.comment_positive:
The staff were amazing, always caring, as soon even before we arrived they organized us taxi from the airport, welcomed us with drinks and necessary explanations about the city in good English,
The room was lovely and the breakfast omelette was great, on our first night we had problem with the room and they immediately changed our room. On our second day I became sick and the staff took special care for us giving us correct food, calling the doctor and always helpful and truly care.
We had great time at the hotel and if we will be back in Hanoi we will sure sleep there again!
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Great option for a not overpriced hotel which has everything you need.
review.comment_positive: Clean, friendly staff, good breakfast , good location, and good price
review.comment_negative: N/a

review.comment_positive: La déco de l'hôtel et de la chambre. Le personnel est adorable et souriant, surtout Nhung à l'espace petit déj. La literie d'une qualité exceptionnelle, la chambre spacieuse et bien agencée. C'est propre, beau et design. Le petit dej est varié et très bon avec des plats locaux fait maison sur commande (pho, pancake, etc) et fruits exotiques (mangue, ananas, fruit de la passion, pastèque, etc). Nous avons eu une chambre plus tôt que l'heure de check in. Très agréable séjour. L'hôtel est 2 pas de la cathédrale, du lac, des plats les plus connus de Hanoï.
review.comment_negative: Comme tout hôtel dans le vieux quartier, petits bruits de travaux de l'hôtel d'à côté, ainsi que les poubelles qui sont à 10m de l'hôtel le soir.

review.rating: A very good stay, value for your money.
review.comment_positive: Rooms are very clean, close to old quarter, with lot of good food spots near by. Quite near to night market on weekends. Extremely friendly and helpful staff. They are very keen to assist us for all our needs.
review.comment_negative: The single window in our room was actually facing into the hotel. It can be a bit uncomfortable at times.

review.rating: Highly recommended.  Will be back every time I visited Hanoi.
review.comment_positive: Breakfast was very good with much varieties both Vietnamese foods and Western. Kitchen staffs were very obliging and helpful. Great location.  The hotel staff at the reception were so courteous and always ready  to help.  I have had a good stayed.

Loved the location, super close to water puppets and night markets. Breakfast in the morning was the best we’ve had on our trip so far. Room was sooo clean and really modern.

review.rating: A fantastic, comfortable base from which to explore Hanoi.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Very well finished rooms, fantastic location central to Hanoi old quarter - less than 5 minutes walk from Hoan Kiem lake. The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. Breakfast was excellent with lots of choice for all diets. 

We arrived early on 29 Feb, very tired and jet lagged. The staff were so welcoming and although we were too early to check into our room, made space for us to shower and freshen up. The staff noticed that 29 Feb was also my husband’s birthday and when we returned later that day to check into our room properly, surprised us with a cake and song. They’d clearly gone well above and beyond to mark the day totally unprompted.

review.comment_negative: Tôi đã note phòng có ban công nhưng chỗ nghĩ không liên hệ lại cho đến khi nhận phòng cũng hoàn toàn không có.

review.comment_positive: Nice  breakfast.  Location ok

The location of the hotel and the staff are the best . The hotel is situated around the center of old quarters and every thing that you want to do , eat or see  in Hanoi is within a walking distance. The staff is simply amazing, I was travelling with my wife and an infant and they really went extra mile to make sure my baby was happy and well taken care of . I would really like to give a big shout out to Lana who was simply amazing and very caring and helpful. The showers in the rooms are great . Overall a great value!
review.comment_negative: The rooms or the at least the room I booked was facing the lantern glass wall and there was another room bang opposite so you could never really remove the curtains or experience having a window :)

review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình Có Ban Công

review.comment_positive: In the Old Quarter where there are so many shops and restaurants. Lively and interesting area

review.rating: Highly recommend, fab staff and central old quarter location
review.comment_positive: Fantastic stay, would highly recommend. Staff were the best I’ve encountered anywhere, very accommodating and allowed us to check out slightly late when I was feeling unwell, kept hold of our bags for a few days while we visited nearby places, welcomed us with juice and even moved fans around because we were so hot when we arrived! The travel desk was helpful and honest, and the printed map they gave us was brilliant, even listing street food recommendations and prices. Room was clean and comfortable and a good size.

review.rating: Casco antiguo con servicio de transporte
review.comment_positive:
Está en el casco antiguo. Tienen servicio de recogida al aeropuerto. El personal es encantador, todo el día con una sonrisa en la cara. Hablan inglés, por lo que se agradece.
Nos permitieron dejar las maletas antes del check in sin costo alguno y cuando volvimos nos lo habían dejado en la habitación.
El desayuno variado y muy bueno. La habitación era igual que en las fotos, espaciosa y limpia con una mini nevera y aire acondicionado.
Lo recomiendo !

Great location in the old quarter, good breakfast. Rooms were comfortable, clean, and air conditioned. We enjoyed our stay very much! Staffs service is excellent/exceptional. A special thank you goes to the receptionists - Lily and Mary - who always greeted us with the biggest smile and had good chats with us, made sure we were well looked after. Everyone will go out of their way to help you out. They are very welcoming, and take pride in their work. We would definiteley highly recommend Babylon Premium Hotel for future visits or anyone staying in Hanoi.

review.rating: Sensacional estancia y amabilidad del personal
review.comment_positive: Súper bien ubicado y excelente personal, me lo recomendaron y acertaron de pleno porque tras el caos que supone estar en Hanoi, llegar a tu hotel y estar tan cómodo, limpio y con esa amabilidad se agradece.
review.comment_negative: Todo me ha gustado

review.rating: lovely boutique hotel in excellent location in Old Quarters!
review.comment_positive: the attentiveness and helpfulness of Lana Hoang and her team. kitchen staff is very accommodating and we love the delicious beef pho and stew!
review.comment_negative: not sure why the rubbish dump is located at the roadside just less than 50m from the hotel.  Although the smell did not transmit into the hotel, it was still quite unpleasant to walk past the rubbish/garbage dump at the end of the day.

review.comment_positive: Personal muy agradable, siempre dispuestos a ayudarte y ofrecerte cualquier servicio

review.rating: Everything was above expectations - I would stay here again.
review.comment_positive: The hotel staff was amazing and we were immediately welcomed with tea when we got there. The room was comfortable and there was very little to no noise, despite the central location of the hotel. The staff were also helpful in introducing us to the area and giving recommendations when we asked. Breakfast was also great with good variety. The location was perfect - close to Hoan Kiem lake and all of the surrounding restaurants and shops.
review.comment_negative: N/A

review.rating: Great hotel in a good location with awesome staff
review.comment_positive: Awesome boutique hotel in a great location in the old quarter. The hotel is close to restaurants and shopping. Very convenient to get around to most places. The staff are awesome - especially Jun and the ladies on reception who were most helpful and gave us good tips on where to visit and to eat. Nam the always smiling doorman greeted us warmly on every occasion - he is a pleasure to meet each time we entered the hotel. Polite and friendly staff are a real asset to the hotel. It is good value for money. Recommended
review.comment_negative: Just the rooms were a bit dark as there were no external windows, otherwise all good.

review.comment_positive: Staff are very friendly and helpful
review.comment_negative: Everything is good

review.comment_positive: Location

-We got an extra bed which was broken. when we called to the manager  they tried to ignore the problem, at the end they gave us another bed.(they didnt charge us for the bed at the end) 
-breakfast isnt good.
-the breakfast was not good
-The stuff asked us not write a review.

review.comment_positive:
Terrific location, loved walking out into the mayhem of wonderful Hanoi ;-) Our welcome was outstanding, as were all the staff for our stay, right down to the young man who opens the door for you as you come and go. I would highly recommend that young man learn as much English as he can as it’ll be a terrific stepping stone to greater things. All staff on reception were attentive, smiling and helpful, which we really appreciated. 

Room was very clean and a good size (although not as big as some we’ve stayed in Vietnam), with everything you need for a happy stay. The bed was ENORMOUS!!! For those of you who like to launder your clothes as you go along, there were plenty of coat hangers (such an under-rated commodity by hotels, yet so valued by customers) to hang wet clothes on, and they dried beautifully overnight in the bathroom.

Breakfast was terrific. We eat anything and everything, so G ate more pancakes than you can poke a stick at (he was looking forward to that more than anything) and I fell in the love with the fruit, and little bread rolls which taste like they’ve been deep fried - decadent but yummy. 

We were actually sad to leave, wish we could’ve stayed a bit longer.
review.comment_negative: My only issue was the lack of window to the outside world. It could’ve been raining zombies out there but you had no clue. Aware that there’s many places in Vietnam like this and it’s due to the way they build in the first place. Not sure if Babylon have rooms with windows but if they do, grab one because this is a very nice place to stay.

review.comment_positive:
Location - Situated at Old Quarter. Many shops and eating places nearby. 
Staff - The hotel manager, Tony, was very responsive and helpful in facilitating our transfer and day tour. The rest of the staff were equally friendly and quick in settling our requests.
Breakfast - It's a boutique hotel and therefore do not expect an extensive buffet spread. The spread was decent and they provide a made-to-order menu.
review.comment_negative: Common area - We visited in June, the hottest month of the year (an oversight during planning : { ) The corridor leading to the rooms are non-airconditioned so it gets stuffy inside the building whenever we return from the 40-degree high heat.

review.comment_positive: Great property, excellent staff, fantastic location.
The hotel provided breakfast which was always tasty and with a lot of variety. The staff are professional, knowledgeable, and helpful.

Zentral gelegen. Fußläufig erreicht man quasi das Herz von Hanoi.

Freundliches hilfsbereites Personal. Auch bei den Sonderwünschen, wie Buchung der Ausflüge,
Inanspruchnahme der Lieferdienste und so weiter, konnten die Hotelmitarbeiter behilflich sein. Sehr gute
Englisch-Kenntnisse bei den Rezeptionisten: in Vietnam eher eine Ausnahme, deswegen hier gesondert
erwähnt.

Unser Zimmer war zum Innenhof/Luftschacht hin gelegen und sehr ruhig.

Das Zimmer war sauber, ein Wasserkocher mit „Grundausstattung" (mehrere Kaffee-Einmal-Portionen, Tee,
Zucker) war vorhanden.

Klimaanlage hat ihren Dienst getan (bei der Hitze von über 35 Grad ist dieser Punkt auch nicht zu
vernachlässigen). Das Bett war SEHR bequem, es gab auch mehrere Kissen. Dusche sauber, bequem,
vergleichsmaßen geräumig und mit ausreichendem Wasserdruck.

WLAN-Verbindung war ebenfalls gut & stabil.
review.comment_negative:
Wir waren wirklich mit unserem Hotel-Aufenthalt sehr zufrieden. Uns fällt kein Punkt ein, was wir unter
"hat uns nicht gefallen" erwähnen könnten. Wir empfehlen unsererseits Babylon Premium Hotel
vorbehaltlos. Sollen wir wieder Hanoi besuchen, wird dieses Hotel auch beim nächsten Mal unsere
Herberge sein.

The room.

Decor and overall feel is a little on the older side. Carpets, designs, furniture, etc, are overdue for a fresh new look... and smell quite frankly.

Not like the pictures online.

review.rating: Had a comfortable stay at the hotel.
review.comment_positive: Convenient location, within walking distance of most attractions and restaurants. Staff are polite and service oriented. Good value for money.

The service was amazing! My partner and I had to check out before 6am and would miss the hotel's breakfast time window. The receptionist was so kind and offered to pack us some breakfast and have it ready for when we checked out. Our room was very spacious and also had a nice balcony with a good view of the streets. You also get a 10% discount off massages if you use their spa downstairs.

the staff here really looked after you and I think that makes the trip! the hotel was wonderful and very accommodating. the hotel spoke to you before checking into the room and gave you a map of top attractions with a list of places to see and where to eat - they simply went above and beyond! I went for my birthday and they treated me very kindly with a cake which was wonderful. the room was clean and fresh with a good variety of breakfast on offer. in essence, if/when I come back to Hanoi, I’ll be coming back to this hotel!
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.rating: A good hotel for a short stay in Hanoi.

review.comment_negative:
Breakfast was repetitive and the cooked eggs weren’t always great. The hotel is good for cleanliness but not perfect eg dust in areas of the room and carpets in common corridors not that clean. 
Also our bathroom shower door was broken and didn’t get fixed despite us raising this.

Dieses war groß, ausgewogen, auf unsere Wünsche angepasst und wirklich frisch und gut (Brot, Eier, Wasser, Früchte, Joghurt, Kuchen). Alles war sehr sauber und ruhig. En este caso quisimos repetir hotel ya que la primera noche en Hanoi la pasamos alli y nos gusto mucho, ubicacion, servicion y personal. Aunque en este caso no podemos valorar el hotel Babylon debido a que por un problema tecnico con el aire condicionado nos re ubicaron a otro hotel de su misma cadena, el hotel Calista. Los servicios y instalaciones de una calidad similar a las del hotel Babylon aunque se veia un hotel con instalaciones mas nuevas. Aun y el problema el personal del hotel Babylon se encargaron de todo: el traslado al otro hotel y nos dieron una habitacion con balcon para compensar las molestias. Hotel Calista tambien muy recomendable.

reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.rating: Good breakfast, sweet staff, noisy building with no windows
review.comment_positive: The staff was so kind! They went above and beyond always to help us, including allowing us a later checkout since our flight home was quite late that day. We were able to store our luggage after checkout no problem. The breakfast was wonderful and had many options.
review.comment_negative: The room was quite small, which was made to feel smaller by the absence of windows. The "window" in our room opened to a shared hallway in the hotel (adding photo of our window from the hallway for reference). This and the fact that the rooms are not soundproofed meant that we could hear everything happening around us: construction next door, guests across the hall, cleaners keeping the hotel tidy outside our window, etc. The noise was the biggest issue for us, since this was the end of our trip and we wanted to rest. If you will have a short stay and don't plan to spend any time in the room during your stay, the hotel should be just fine.

review.rating: Overall, I could not fault the staff of hotel Babylon and the location of the hotel was good. There are areas for improv
review.comment_positive: The staff were all extremely friendly and helpful. They went above and beyond for us booked airport transfer, made us a dinner reservation, booked a car for us to the restaurant etc. I would rate the staff 10/10. However, when I filled out the feedback sheet for the hotel I didn’t like that I was questioned on why I gave the hotel 7/10 and was asked to increase my rate to 10/10 on booking.com. The location was great, located right in the old quarter. We also were collected from our hotel and dropped back in the evening from our tour to Ha Long Bay which we booked through the hotel.
review.comment_negative: We booked a junior suite room. The bed was comfortable and the AC was good (well needed as it was so hot outside). However, the bathroom could have been cleaner by western standards. Each day, our room was made up with fresh towels and the bed made but the bathroom wasn’t cleaned each day. It should be noted that the balcony area was not how it appeared in the photos on booking.com. What appears to be a large area with seating and an egg chair was a tight space with space for 2 people to sit on chair and not use the table stuffed in the corner. What brought down my rating in particular was the spa. Myself and my partner booked in for a traditional Vietnamese massage. I found this quite painful at stages and had to ask the masseuse to please go softer. The following day I actually had some bruises from the massage. I also booked in for a manicure. The therapist shaped my nails well however, she did not paint my nails the colour I asked for and painted so many layers that they never dried. I had to pay a different salon that evening to remove the polish.

review.rating: Great start to our holiday in Vietnam!

I asked to be moved after the 1st night if bad sleep. They managed to move me after the second night. Im not sure if the staff member actually followed through on my my request to start with. Second room  better but still no opportunity to open curtains for natural light.. It looked into an internal well with lamps and directky across to other rooms windows.. In  the photos it  shows red lamps through the sheer curtains. It looks quite nice but in reality you dont want the curtains open as you feel like you can be observed. All the balcony rooms or the higher priced rooms I think?

review.comment_positive:
Hotel muy céntrico en el viejo Hanoi.
Se puede acceder a muchos sitios de interés a pie, lo que es muy conveniente visto el trafico tan importante en Hanoi.
Reservamos la habitación “Executive”. No es muy grande .Pero si no tienes muchas maletas, es lo mejor opción ( buen armario ) - Piso 3
La habitacion da a un patio interior muy bonito y MUY TRANQUILO con linternas vietnamitas donde se puede abrir las ventanas.
Decoración muy bonita . Muy limpio.
Desayuno muy variado y casero. 
El staff es MUY atento, servicial y sonriente.
Consejo : no reservar habitación con balcón. Esta da en la calle, y es MUY ruidosa.
RECOMENDAMOS : excursion en barco a Halong Bay con SENA cruises ( nos lo organízó el Señor Tony Tran del hotel ). Es un barco pequeño , encantador y sobre todo MUY BUENA COMIDA, muy bien organizado.

Das Personal war wahnsinnig bemüht! Auch nachdem wir einen Tag verschlafen haben, haben wir noch verspätete frühstücken können. Am letzten Tag sind wir erst abends mit dem Zug weitergefahren und konnten vor Abfahrt nochmal im Hotel duschen. 
Die Lage ist wirklich super: Man ist sehr schnell an vielen Sehenswürdigkeiten (zu Fuß) und befindet sich doch in einer Gegend, die bis auf die Zeit des Feierabendverkehrs ziemlich ruhig ist. 
Alles in allem kann man das Hotel aber wirklich weiterempfehlen!

L’hôtel Babylone est très bien situé dans le vieux quartier d’Hanoï, le personnel est très gentil, aux petits soins et très serviable! 
La chambre était très propre, le standing très bien! Le petit déjeuner est très bien aussi et varié: fruits frais, œufs réalisés à la minute, crêpes au chocolat… et la possibilité de demander un take away! 
Nous avons passé un super séjour dans cet hôtel et y retournerons sans hésiter!
Staff were very helpful in arranging a bus to Sapa when I missed my planned one

review.rating: It was an unforgettable experience, and I would definitely return.
review.comment_positive:
My experience at the Babylon Premium Hotel was top-notch. From the moment I arrived, all of the staff attended to my needs and checked in on me several times a day. Christina, Tan, and many others (forgot names) were incredibly nice and always greeted me with smiles. They booked me cabs and tours during my trip, which were always on time and safe.   
I enjoyed my room, which had an extremely comfortable bed, and it was immaculate every time I returned. The breakfast was amazing and I really enjoyed the Pho. They provided me with a map of the city that was easy to read and pointed me in the direction of great food. 
Thanks, Babylon for a fantastic stay!

review.comment_positive: The only good thing about this hotel is it’s location.
review.comment_negative:
Overall experience was beyond horrible. Booked 3 nights based on high rating and good reviews. The pictures of the hotel gave nothing to do with the reality. Double deluxe room was small and dark. Tiny window didn’t give enough light. Even during the day you have to keep the lights on. The room was dirty. When I just checked in and came to the room I saw black hairs on the floor. The shower gel and the shampoo provided by the hotel were half empty and also had black hairs stuck to the bottles. Probably had been used by someone before. The safe box was not working, the staff failed to fix it and just left it like this. When I took the hotel guide and placed in on the bed I saw that it was stained with something that smelt like food and it went all over the bed linen. Disgusting. Had to call the reception and ask to change the duvet cover, which they did. The newly brought duvet cover was clean but with a massive hole on the side. I still tried to be patient but when I came down for breakfast in the morning I realized I couldn’t take it any more. The buffet breakfast looked like 3 plates - 2 with smth hard to tell what it was and the 3d one with toast bread. I decided to have a coffee with toast as there was nothing else to eat. There was not even enough coffee in the jug to fill one mug and no milk and the only option to have toast with was butter. When I politely asked the staff if it was possible to have some jam as don’t eat butter, they said no. I went straight to the reception in order to cancel my next 2 nights and the receptionist became rude and didn’t make any effort to resolve the situation. Luckily I managed to contact booking.com and they were very helpful, contacted the hotel and I managed to get the cancellation done. 
If you are expecting a spa in the hotel it’s also not there. The so called spa looks like a basement full of trash and dust.

I didn't expect much for the free breakfast but wow it's another great touch, a lot of choices and so yummy.

I've stayed at a lot of hotels in Ha Noi but this one definitely gonna be my 1st choice next time.

review.comment_positive: It’s a lovely property in the centre of the old quarter Hanoi. It’s very close to all the attractions and entertainment available in the area. Our room was exceptionally clean and it had a huge bathroom and lovely balcony. The stars of the show tho are the staff. Everyone is so nice and helpful and always smiling. They really make you feel at home and never hesitate to help. Special thanks to Miss Lily and Miss Mary. If we ever come back we will be coming to see them again 🙏

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Babylon has wonderful staff. They were so so good to us. They kept our bags for 3 days while we did the Ha Giang Loop and did laundry for us while we were gone also. They were so friendly and helpful. We stayed for 3 nights went to Ha Giang and returned for one night before moving on to our next city. Everything was spotless and we got an upgrade. There was shampoo conditioner and shower gel. Lots of toiletries. Bottled water was provided. Ideal location in old town close to the lake and markets. I arranged airport transfers through them. I have recommended it to my friends and I would definitely stay here again if I am ever in Hanoi. Thank you for two wonderful stays.

review.comment_positive: Location, staff,
review.comment_negative:
The staff were amazing. Especially,  the kitchen lady was very polite and ready to help as i am vegetarian. The breakfast was average but enough with choice for non vegetarians. The location is very good. Accessible to most sight seeing places by foot.

The room was very small. Felt clustrphobic. It was at the back near sewage. Couldn't open the window due to an awful smell. So, there is no fresh air or ventilation. The photos on the website are deceiving. I requested to change my room, but I was told the hotel was fully booked and better rooms were more expensive. There was another lady who did the same complaint. 
It can not be called 4 Star Hotel. 

They were very keen on booking the excursions and airport taxi from the moment you booked the hotel and step in. Outside and on Booking.com.com, they are much cheaper. I booked one from the very next door and it was 15 dollars cheaper. Airport taxi with Booking.com was much cheaper and convenient. 
I booked this hotel because of all the positive reviews. But I realised, when I was told if there is anything negative not to write review, otherwise,  staff don't get the bonus.
I find this very unfair because tourists depend on the reviews to make the decisions.

I had to write my honest opinion.

No podíamos hacer el check in para el vuelo de vuelta y en recepción se ofrecieron a hacérnoslo.

review.rating: Muy buena relación/ calidad precio, lo recomiendo!
review.comment_positive: Está situado a pocos minutos caminando del lago, mercado del finde semana. El personal es muy atento y amable, se preocupan por todo siempre. La cama de la habitación es espectacular, además de grande es súper cómoda, hemos coincidido con esto las 8 personas que viajábamos. El desayuno buffet estaba bien, pero para una persona celiaca no hay opciones, solo los huevos y la fruta, que por cierto carecía de sabor. el servicio de lavandería lo recomiendo si la ropa no tiene manchas de aceite ( porque no te las quitan) pero el precio por kg es muy barato y te llega muy bien presentado y con muy buen olor. En el baño te ponen cepillo de dientes, cuchilla de afeitar, bastoncillos y peine, y unas zapatillas. Te dejan 2 botellas de agua gratis al día, te y café en la habitación, además de una tetera. relación calidad/ precio lo recomiendo! muchas gracias a todo el personal!

review.rating: Modern Vietnamese decor in Babylon Hotel
review.comment_positive: Professional, friendly and attentive staffs. Managers and reception staff spoke English well. Hotel with very lovely interior decorations...colourful small lanterns, potteries, pictures and ceramics... Breakfast spread good enough. Easy to move around in the Old Quarter. A bit quieter due to its site. Near to some nice eateries too. Special thanks to Sales Manager Tony and Bich at Reception. They did a wonderful job!
review.comment_negative: Stayed 1st 2N upon arrival at Babylon, headed up to Sapa by Luxury Van (combi), stayed for 4D3N...upon returning on 18/11 for a night stay before departure, we were informed that several rooms were not ready due to repairs to their aircons...so we were transferred by taxi to one of their chain hotels, 4 streets away and upgraded us to a Jr. Suite.  Breakfast spread at Golden Legend Diamond Hotel needed improvements. Jr. Suite room with reclining seat and large balcony. Room's main door doesn't close well due to alignment and 2 sockets in the room needed to be changed as it were falling off/loose which we had informed the Reception staff. Manager, Zenky was attentative, friendly and spoke English well. Staffs were OK too. Thanks for their efforts to remedy our situation... Our preference still with Babylon.

Everything you need is in walking distance. Airport transfer worked without any issue and is not much more expensive than taking a taxi.

review.comment_positive:
Lana and her team were so helpful they made our stay in hanoi so easy, making us feel welcome and assisting us in finding things to do and places to see. They even arranged a tour to hay long for us which was great.
The room was clean with nice facilities, and was made up for us every day.
The location of the hotel is brilliant for getting amongst the hustle and bustle of the city. 
Communication with the hotel staff was easy in English and they are genuinely interested in getting you the best deals and not ripped off.

Oh and the breakfast was lovely too!

review.comment_positive:
시설은 깨끗하고 직원은 아주 친절합니다.
구 시가지 중심부에 위치하여 주요 관광지 그랩 이용 2,000원이면 도달 합니다. 
(젊은 분들은 걸어 다녀도 됩니다.)
특히 신속항원검사병원(MEDLATEC 종합병원)까지 그랩으로 45,000동 거리입니다.
맛집 문재인대통령 방문한 국수집이 20m 거리에 있습니다. 
(Pho 10 Ly Quoc Su) 65,000동
베트남에서 10일간 머물렀는데 이 국수집이 제일 맛있었습니다. 
내 영어가 서툰데 천천히 정확하게 발음해줘서 한마디도 놓치지 않고 다 이해했습니다.
짐 보관도 하고 관광 예약 공항 택시 예약도 합니다.
나의 경우 밤 늦은 비행기인데 짐 보관하고 관광 후 돌아와서 오래동안 호텔 내부에서 머무르며 샤워도 했습니다
(샤워시설은 로비에 딸린 화장실이며  타올 서비스해 줍니다)
밤이되면 호텔주변에 길거리 음식점이 즐비하게 시작됩니다. 
(우리는 너무 더워서 경험해 보지 못했습니다.)
review.comment_negative:
공항 드랍 택시비는 400,000동입니다.
친절하고 정시에 옮니다.
호텔 규모 대비 비싼 편입니다.
한국 모텔 평일요금 3만원 급인데 평일 요금이 4만원대입니다. 
창문이 없는 방도 있어요.

review.rating: Slightly expensive but a good solid hotel...
review.comment_positive:
Stayed here for 2 days - room was as described and the staff were fantastic! On arrival given lots of information about Ha Noi ... one of the best we've seen during our time in Vietnam. Good English spoken so no issues at all with communicating. 

Room - well appointed and spacious. Bed on the firm side and some new pillows (higher quality) would make it perfect. No complaint but have certainly had better.

Breakfast - actually very good with local and western options available. The spread was very impressive and certainly got the day off to a good start. 

Location - excellent for walking or getting taxi ... by foot: 4 minutes to the lake, 7 minutes to main food street and 10 mins to French quarter. What makes it better is the street it's on is very quiet in the late afternoon and evening. The quietest city stay we've had. 

Service - very good; we had a maintenance issue which clearly no previous occupant had raised and it was fixed whilst we were out. Great service experience.

Value for money - this is the only thing I would say; the stay here is very expensive vs like for like or better hotels. For a mid range this is the most expensive we've stayed in during our 45 days in VN ... you can get the same for less HOWEVER you know the price when you book and the location (quiet yet central), service from staff and breakfast do go a good way when it comes to increased value. If it was priced 1/4 less then it would be a 10. 

Overall - absolutely worth a stay here and would recommend.
El desayuno, la decoración, el trato.

review.comment_positive:
Perfect Location in the Old Quarter and also the Mausoleum and Hilton Prison are in walking distance. The staff was simply amazing. They were extremely friendly and helped us with arranging everything we needed during our stay in Hanoi. We originally booked only two nights, but after the first one we extended by one night and even came back for another night after our two nights on a Halong Bay Cruise. On our last day we took the night train to Hue. Even though we had already checked out, they offered us to shower, which was amazing after a day walking through Hanoi. 
If we ever come to Hanoi, we will definitely come back.

review.comment_positive: I think the place is a magnificent place to stay. Good breakfast. Nice location. Great potential and I know they've had a lot of satisfied customers. The ball just got dropped in my case. I have no doubt it was a simple slip-up. However, they do need to be aware of it.
review.comment_negative: In my case, they were simply not ready for my arrival, which was surprising as I got their best room. One of the main reasons I got it was because of the private patio, but no one bothered to clean up. It was full of dust and I am not talking lightly coated. I had to clean my feet in the shower. The roses out back were nicely potted, but just dusty. The electricity for the room wasn't even on when I arrived. The only thing policy-wise that I did not care for was the "one key per room" thing. Two people have to share a key which makes it difficult if the two of you need to do separate things. I have never experience that anywhere and I do hotels a lot.

review.comment_positive: Tutto. Staff gentile ed accogliente. Ottima posizione per raggiungere tutti i siti turistici facilmente.La colazione varia ed abbondante, con ampia scelta di frutta. Obiettivamente manca la possibiltà di fare una colazione dolce. A richiesta vengono fatte ottimi pan cake.

Rooms were spotlessly clean and a good breakfast was included.  Would highly recommend this hotel to everyone!

Room was comfortable enough, they had extra pillows in the wardrobe if needed. . Right in the middle of old town which was great as lots of food places and bars nearby. Staff were great in general. Breakfast was really good you could have what was out or ask for pancakes/omlettes etc to be made which was great as I am very fussy!
