The smaller shower head which can be removed from the stand was a bit broken, it wouldn't stay where we left it. The card key holder in our room was dodgy and sometimes when we came in, despite putting the card in and all the lights coming on, it would set an alarm off on the door which was very irritating!

review.rating: An excellent stay at Babylon Premium Hotel & Spa!
review.comment_positive:
We stayed at Babylon Premium Hotel & Spa for the last week of our Vietnam tour. We booked the Babylon Suite room as a bit of a splurge and didn't regret it for a minute - it was well worth it.
The room was excellent: a very comfortable bed, seating area, desk, mini bar & electric kettle. Plenty of lights, power points and good black-out curtains.  This room has a very large balcony which had a lounger, a swing seat and chairs.
What really made our stay exceptional however was the staff:  always so helpful, attentive and kind! Thank you Mary, Nhung, Andrea, Mimi and Tu and all the others whose names I cannot remember, sorry!
The breakfast buffet is fabulous.  A great selection, with a good variety, and excellent pho, pancakes and eggs to order.  Nhung, our breakfast server, remembered our preferences each morning - a lovely special touch.
We highly recommend Babylon Premium Hotel & Spa and will definitely stay there again on our next trip to Hanoi. Thank you!

perfecto

This property exceeded our expectations by a lot.
The location is great, it's 6 minutes away from a lake where there's a night market on the weekends with live entertainment and a lot of cafes and shops.
The room was comfortable, clean, and had everything we ne needed.
The staff were amazing, perfect even, going above and beyond on every occasion:
- they were welcoming and accommodating on every turn
- they seamlessly booked a tour for us without us having to take care of anything except choosing the date. We would have booked more tours with them but didn't have the time.
- we had to do a PCR test to enter the country we were going next, and the reception even called a hospital, asking them when they could see us, so we wouldn't have to go there and loose time. They also asked several other questions we wouldn't be able to ask by phone due to the language barrier 
- they handled our laundry, making our multiple-week vacation a lot more comfortable
- they kept our laptops in the reception with them when we didn't need / want to take them.

This hotel was a genuine better experience than the 5 star hotel we had stayed a few weeks previously, by being more personal with the guests, and helping us whenever necessary.
Worth every cent and much more.

review.comment_negative:
WARNING. Do not use this hotel, very poor service from staff , all they want to do is sell their tours and sim cards..
I purchased a sim card from reception, was told I would receive 4 GB per day for 30 days worked fine while we were there in Hanoi but had 4 weeks in Vietnam  visiting various destinations. After 10 days received a warning I had used 2.6 GB of data which was impossible. Tried to sort out but all messages and phone calls were in Vietnamize .  Tried to get  staff in hotels we were in  to help , they could not. Phoned Babylon Hotel to explain they didn't want to know or help resolve this problem, they got my money that was all they were interested in. AFTER 17 DAYS , A WARNING I HAD USED 2.75 GB of data. then stopped working completely.  Was told I would get 4GB per day , didn't even get more than 2.76 GB. DONT BELEIVE WHAT THEY TELL YOU.

review.rating: Absolute Hotelempfehlung in bester Lage im Hanoi Old Quarter!
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel liegt super zentral im Hanoi Old Quarter, sehr nah am Hoan Kiem Lake.
Viele Orte und zahlreiche Restaurants sind fußläufig erreichbar.
Man kann also aus dem Hotel rausgehen und ist sofort mitten im Geschehen von Hanoi.
Auch der Night Market, der an Wochenenden stattfindet, ist direkt um die Ecke.

Die Ausstattung und Sauberkeit der Zimmern sind absolut in Ordnung.

Positiv hervorzuheben ist definitv das Personal, das uns zu jeder Zeit außerordentlich freundlich begrüßt hat, selbst wenn wir mehrmals am Tag ein und aus gingen, und immer total holfsbereit war.

Wir kamen insgesamt 3mal für jeweils eine Nacht in diesem Hotel unter, da wir dazwischen für mehrere Tage nach Sapa und zur Halong Bay gereist sind.
Hierfür konnten wir unsere großen Gepäckstücke auch problemlos im Hotel belassen, um nur mit Rucksäcken reisen zu müssen.
Nachdem wir von Sapa mit dem Nachtzug auch sehr früh zurück waren, haben wir sogar ein Frühstück aufs Haus bekommen, für unsere Loyalität 🙂

review.room_type: Phòng Suite Gia Đình Có Tầm Nhìn
review.comment_positive:
Phòng rất rộng và sạch.
Vị trí ngay giữa khu ăn uống, rất thuận tiện đi bộ dạo phố và ra bờ hồ.
Các bạn lễ tân và nv dễ thương, nhiệt tình hỗ trợ.
review.comment_negative:
Sảnh đợi có nhiều muỗi, có lẽ do không gian hơi tối. Góp ý ks nên đặt tinh dầu sả để đuổi muỗi.
Điểm trừ không đáng kể bên vẫn cho 10đ nhé.

review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
We had a great stay at the Babylon hotel with our family of 4 adults and 2 kids. The hotel was in a great location, literally right next to some good bun cha places. We had the family connecting room with a balcony, and surprisingly it wasn't as loud as we expected.

The staff did a great job taking care of us. Especially the front reception staff, and the hotel manager Lana, were all very nice and provided us all the necessary information. Business has only slowly resume in Vietnam so not everything is perfect yet, but the staff definitely made our stay great. Highly recommended!

review.rating: sehr zu empfehlen, ich komme wieder.
review.comment_positive: Unser Executive Zimmer war super schön und extraordinär. Gleich beim Ankunft wurden wir mit einem leckeren Mango-Saft begrüßt. das Hotel ist sehr zu empfehlen.
review.comment_negative: die wenigen Flecken an der Bettdecke haben uns nicht gestört. Man sah, dass sie sauber und gebügelt sind. Dusch Abfluss lief nicht schnell genug.

review.comment_positive: Sehr zentrale Lage, unglaublich nettes Personal und sehr sauber. Zum check-in bekommt man einen Informationszettel, welcher hilfreiche Informationen zu lokalen Gegebenheiten, etc. enthält. Das Personal war immer sehr hilfsbereit, was Sightseeing-Empfehlungen an ging.
review.comment_negative: Das Frühstück hätte eine noch größere Auswahl haben können und die Massagen im hauseigenen Spa sind für vietnamesische Verhältnisse relativ teuer.

review.comment_positive:
Bardzo stylowy hotel w samym sercu starego miasta w Hanoi. Idealna lokalizacja dla zwiedzających. 
Bardzo sprawna i miła obsługa. Zorganizowano naszej grupie transfer z lotniska. bardzo dobrą opcją jest możliwość przechowania bagażu (dla nas to było bardzo ważne gdyż nie musiałyśmy jeździć z dużą walizką do Sapy i Ha Long)
Bardzo ładne pokoje z dużym wewnętrznym oknem (dzięki temu nie dochodził uliczny zgiełk i było bardzo cicho).
Ładna i nowoczesna łazienka. 
Bardzo smaczne śniadanie.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Absolutely amazing! The room was great, the bed very comfortable. Location is as central as you can get, and the best thing is that at the same time you don't hear the outside noise in the room (and with Hanoi busy streets that's an important thing). The staff is extremely nice and helpful, they made our stay truly fantastic! Honestly, the hotel team was the highlight of this experience:)
For the breakfast you have both buffet style and a la carte, with Vietnamese and Western options - vety tasty. They also offer travel options and can store your bags during your trip.
I wish we could stay longer with them, and I'd love to stay here again in the future!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
After an absolutely horrific day in Saigon airport yesterday I arrived at the Babylon late where I was told my room needed a fix to the Aircon unit. Ok at this point I was very very irate , But Anthony on the front desk dealt with the situation like the professional he is and kept the situation calm and level. ... The Aircon was fixed within the hour and by the time I had eaten dinner the situation was perfect. 
 Very very friendly staff and and the place is an absolute gem of a hotel great location and very clean , the value for money is unmatched in Hanoi...... 
 Very happy and the next time I'm in Hanoi it will be at the Babylon I stay for sure 👍❤️

review.comment_positive: Estuve alojado con mi familia en el Hotel Babylon Premium de Hanoi. La estancia fue perfecta, pero sobre todo tengo que destacar la amabilidad de todo el personal. Nos recibieron con una bebida de bienvenida, luego nos explicaron todas las actividades y lugares interesante que visitar en Hanoi, así como los restaurantes y cafetería donde comer. Nos dieron un mapa y todas las explicaciones por escrito. El desayuno fue muy bueno, tanto el buffet como la carta, todo incluido en el precio de la habitación. Un diez para todo el personal y la gestión del hotel.

review.rating: Travel after the pandemic can throw surprises!
review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Clean property and great location around Hoan Kiem lake. Very polite and attentive staff.
review.comment_negative:
As two couples, we had booked a large family room with balcony. On our arrival we were greeted with an apology that our booked room had been given to someone else.
We understand this happened because booking operations have suffered during Covid lockdowns.
We were offered a choice between
separated rooms on different floors, or a similar room in a different property 500m away - one with no reviews. We chose the former as we were not keen to change the location, and because of the lack of information on the alternative property. The rooms so allocated turned out to be a serious downgrade - small and with no balconies or view.
After a claustrophobic first night we asked to be moved. the hotel arranged our transfer. The other room turned out to be more suitable with 2 bedrooms, a laundry and a balcony, the location not bad, but two serious flaws:
1) the bathroom was not lockable. I can’t understand how two couples are expected to share a single bathroom with no lock!
2) the breakfast arrangement was bespoke, and consideration for vegetarians was poor. the result was unsatisfactory.

Through all these, I have to say the staff tried their best to address all the problems we faced. I hope the management will soon be able to get the operations back in order.

review.comment_positive: Gute Lage, super freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal. Die westliche Frühstücksauswahl ist klein (was in nach- Corona Zeiten normal ist). Alternativ gibt es eine leckere Pho.

ideally positioned to visit everything by foot, but in a quiet spot. We even stayed the night Vietnam won the finale of the SEA games (= all scooters out celebrating) and heard nothing when back at the hotel. The hotel has also maintained very high levels of cleanliness, which is well appreciated!
review.comment_negative: based on the pictures we thought there would be a regular window, but actually it's a window on the reception/inside of the hotel, don't expect natural light. Luckily, it turned out great since as a result, the room is very quiet and peaceful and the owner made the best out of the building!!! anyway, Hanoi is awaiting for you and there is plenty of natural light in the numerous cafes

review.comment_positive: We were in room 301 (junior suite) and there was plenty of space.
review.comment_negative:
It is quite warm in the room, because in the afternoon the sun is full in the room and the air conditioning is not powerful enough to cool this room.  

The neighbors were also busy with carpentry in the night of 11 to 12 October.  Which the hotel can't do anything about but is a strange time to do this.

There were some stains on the duvet.

review.rating: A delightful stay and great value for money.
review.comment_positive:
We had a double room with a large balcony. The room was large and comfortable and the bathroom was large and included a bath.
The location of the hotel is right in the old quarter and within easy walking distance of the lake.
The buffet breakfast was varied and good quality.
The staff were delightful - very friendly and attentive - and provided a level of service we didn’t expect at a hotel in that price range.
review.comment_negative: The was nothing we didn’t like.

review.rating: Great place to stay pity no bar

review.rating: Had a lovely time, and I absolutely plan on returning!
review.comment_positive: Perfectly located in the Old Quarter of Hanoi, easy to get to so many areas! The staff are incredibly friendly and helpful. The breakfast was an exceptional bonus to the value of the rooms!
review.comment_negative: The rooms are the perfect temperature, but the hallways can get a little humid during the day.

review.rating: Perfect value for money with good comfort minus 5 star facilities.
review.comment_positive: Their staff is very hospitable and give great food suggestions. You can almost get anything resolved by them. The property is centrally located so most of the old quarter is very easily accessible on foot.
review.comment_negative: Not much to not like about. I’d say their food is not so great and the facilities aren’t as much - probably as expected from a boutique hotel. They cover all that up with their hospitality.

review.rating: Amazing people with comfort rooms, the location is nearby the Home Kiem Lake. Love it

I & my colleague booked for message.  The staff knew we are not family in different gender, but she still arranged we made message in same room just for cost saving.  
The female staff broke my luggage after check-out since she said she tried to help me to take my luggage off stairs.  she is short and there was another door man there, I couldn't understand why she did that to me.  perhaps it's a punish to the guest who complained on her service.

review.comment_positive: 직원 분 친절하시고 영어로 소통잘됨. 웰컴티로 코코넛워터 주는데 맛있음. 홀짝. 조식 맛있고 사파 간다고 말하면 미니밴 지원해줌. 한국 사람보단 다른 나라 사람들이 더 많이 머무르는데 사파가는 미니밴에서 불편할 것 같으면 걍 따로 가도 됨. 방 갑자기 업그레이드 해줘서 개꿀. 방 넓고 깔끔했고 에어컨 잘 나왔고 좋았음.
review.comment_negative: 개인적으로 없었음. 가격에 비해 좋은 룸컨디션에 살짝 놀람.

The hotel exceeded my expectations. Amazing staff, excellent location and very clean.

I was very impressed with the staff. They were all so friendly and helpful!

On my way to the airport (after check-out) I noticed I had forgotten something in my room. I called the hotel and they were happy to help.
A special thanks to Lily, who helped me with this and was always friendly and helpful during my stay. She's amazing!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The staff were incredibly helpful and friendly. Mary, Chu, Vivian and Lily were all very kind and made my stay go smoothly. The location is excellent. The room was comfortable and had good bathroom facilities. The spa is also very good with excellent value

Struttura situata nella città vecchia ma in una stradina defilata dal caos. Hotel ottimamente mantenuto con spa di cui abbiamo usufruito con massaggi super ! Camera nuova dotata di ogni confort e pulitissima come il resto dell’ hotel con letto comodissimo e bagno molto spazioso con doccia molto grande. Staff super gentile e molto disponibile, complimenti!!! Colazione a buffet molto varia! Abbiamo prenotato due escursioni con loro: 2 giorni nella baia di halong (nave stupenda e cibo eccellente) e 3 giorni a Sapa con guida prezzo ottimo e super organizzato in ogni particolare. Se dovessi tornare alloggerei sicuramente al Babylon !

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Absolutely fantastic hotel, and only have very positive things to say. Tony from Babylon Premium helped organise my trip months in advance - and it all went incredibly smoothly. I stayed three different nights over a week period, and Babylon was my "home" as I went to and from tours leaving from Hanoi. A great location right in the bustle of the old quarter. The staff were superb. They kept my bag safe, I was able to have my laundry sorted, and they answered all my questions about food / where to go. Also arranged a last minute food tour for me to join in Hanoi. The rooms are clean and comfortable, and quiet! - just what you need for a cosy nights sleep. And a decent breakfast, with take away organised for an early start.

The 2 night tour to Sapa - that I organised with the hotel months before - was fabulous, with efficient van transfers, good itinerary, and a comfortable hotel, and homestay. Made it easy that could sort some of the tours directly with the hotel.

It was really good. I felt very well looked after and appreciated all the support from Tony and the hotel team for my trip to Hanoi. Staying with Babylon just made it so much easier to plan the visit as a solo traveller. And helped make it very special.

I would highly recommend Babylon Premium Hotel and will be back to stay should I visit Hanoi again.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Location was good and room was clean and comfortable (although it is worth noting that many do not have a window!). Staff were very friendly and had good English and were helpful throughout our stay except for the incident detailed below.
review.comment_negative: Upon departing, the hotel booked an airport transfer for us. I paid for it by credit card, but the hotel staff insisted the transaction had not gone through as their card machine battery died during the transaction. Upon checking the bank app on my phone, the transaction had gone through. I showed the staff the statement and proof of the transaction, but they insisted that my bank app was wrong. I asked them how it was possible that my bank in Australia could know I had just tried a similar transaction if the transaction wasn’t successfully processed. They continued to insist I was wrong and that we could not take the airport transfer unless we paid again. In fear of missing our flight, we paid again. The staff maintained that they would check with their bank the next day and that if we had been double charged, they would refund us. Upon return to Australia we contacted them again and sent through evidence of both transactions. They checked with their bank and confirmed that the initial transaction had in fact been fully processed. They apologised for double charging us and said they would refund us. A week later I followed up as I had not received the refund. They asked that I provide them with a PayPal account so that they could transfer the money without having to pay an international transaction fee. At this point growing frustrated, I created a PayPal profile and sent through the details. Two weeks later, I followed up again. They asked that I provide them with a OnePay account instead. I refused and insisted they either refund the initial payment to my credit card or use the PayPal details I had provided. Two and a half months later, I have still not been refunded. The hotel now maintain that they have transferred the funds directly to my bank account, but I have never provided them with my bank account number so it is not possible.

review.comment_positive: Świetna lokalizacja. Pokoje wygodne i funkcjonalne, ale nie za duże. Personel miły i pomocny. Śniadania smaczne z dużym wyborem.

review.rating: I felt comfortable, protected and taken care of.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: I liked most of the things about the hotel: the professional, friendly attitude of the staff, the location, the atmosphere, the premises. When Lana said, "You have arrived home" upon my arrival I thought it was a figure of speech. But it was a reality, and I felt at home every minute of my stay. Hahn, Lana, Linh, Phong were extremely nice and helpful, taking care of more than my time in the hotel only. Without their assistance, practical advice and useful suggestions my experience in Hanoi would not have been so rich or my insight into the Vietnamese culture so illuminating. Thank you very much for everything.
